name: Custom YouTube Speed
description: This is just a pet project of mine that I use to make YouTube watching a little better. I cannot guarantee that it will work flawlessly (loading default speed, custom speed values, etc.) on every YouTube video, but it is open source (https://github.com/elunico/custom-youtube-speed) and I am open to suggestions/issues/fixes but no promises about making them happen. This extension was created with the awesome extensionizr.com
